name: LD 48 - Deeper
description:
Welcome to a game where I spent 99% of the time dealing with weird Unity Tilemap edge cases and other random slowdowns.

You gotta go down. Arrows/Joystick to move, Space/A to shoot/slow your fall.

Shoot ore tiles to get more ammo, shoot explosives to clear more stuff.

Get as deep as you can.

Positives:

At least I got to play around with Perlin noise and procedural generation.

Known issues:

Tiles look like crap

Couldn't get adjacent chunks to work with a custom rule tile so they look like garbage.

Large stutters with chunk loading

A general feeling of disappointment and annoyance.
